description: Pearl has grown up idolizing the Seed Bearer. And rightfully so­­he is her father, after all. Without him knowing, she’d been watching him inseminate the young girls of the temple year after year, hiding behind curtains and pillars, waiting for her chance to be loved like that. When the time finally came, she couldn’t be more excited. Even though it won’t be her father who’s inspecting her, he’s insisted on being present when his little girl is called to the Order.
title: Sister Pearl The Calling
